body:
Code for Science & Society has a position available in Amherst, MA: Analyze public interest technology communities’ needs and then design, test, and develop open source software to meet those needs. Recommend software upgrades for customers’ existing programs and systems. Design each piece of an application using machine learning and natural language processing. Ensure that a program continues to function normally through software maintenance and testing, which involves working with relational databases, data modeling, and optimizations for high volume of data. Willingness to work at odd hours when on call, required. May telecommute. 

To apply, mail resume to Jessica Hardwicke, Code for Science & Society, 3439 SE Hawthorne Blvd. Suite # 247, Portland OR 97214. Please Reference Job ID: CSS2020CDMC. EOE.
title: Research Software Engineer - OpenReview
description: Code for Science & Society has a position available in Amherst, MA: Analyze public interest technology communities’ needs and then design, test, and develop open source software to meet those needs.
